pkgmetadata.longdescription: Whine modifies a lot of the commands bound to the main Emacs keys, like SPC and C-f and RET and C-x C-s. They still do the same things they did before, but they whine about it, printing messages which do not in general have anything to do with reality. The main lossage is C-l, which refreshes the screen and then whines about it so that you can't get a clear message line.
